resources.string: NWT
Welcome!
This string welcomes the user to the app.
User Login
This button is for user login.
Guest Login
This button is for guest login.
Let\'s get started.
You will be asked a series of questions related to your personal finances.
If a question does not apply to you, \n leave it blank
We\'ll do the rest!
Begin
Assets
Liabilities
Next
This section will ask about your assets, such as property, business, and other.
All responses entered will be kept confidential, and are never saved.
What is the total dollar amount of the money you currently have in your checking accounts?
What is the total dollar amount of the money you currently have in your savings accounts?
What is the total dollar amount of the money you currently have in your retirement accounts?
What is the total current market value dollar amount of the money you have in your investment accounts?
What is the number of cash you have on hand?
What is the current market value of your home(s)?
What is the current value of your business interests and/or venues?
What is the cash value of any insurance policies you are associated with?
What is the total value of your car(s), with depreciation costs accounted for?
What is the value of any other personal property that you own (jewelry, art, furniture, etc.)?
List the outstanding balances on your credit card(s), if any.
List the value of outstanding housing mortgage payment(s) you have, if any.
List the value of the car loans you may have, if any.
List the value of student loans you may have, if any.
List the value of any taxes that are due, if applicable.
List the total value of bills that must be paid, if any.
List the total value of rent due, if any.
List any other debt, loans, or outsanding payments due
